title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not available.
EB: Either both the Open Project and Close Project options should be available, or neither should be enabled.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Select both P1 and P2.
2. Observe that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not.
